response.overview: Protagonist Maridasa a college going student,living with bed ridden father and a florist mother. Sudden demise of father makes him to work at a tea shop and study through correspondence. In the meantime,he comes across a girl and both falls in love. One bad day when he was serving tea,he was humiliated by a underworld don. In a rage Maridasa
response.title: MAJESTIC 2
